urls.title: Nearly 90 percent of the coronavirus deaths in Connecticut last week were nursing home patients
urls.description: Nearly 90% of the COVID-related deaths recorded by the state last week occurred in nursing homes as COVID-19 continues to attack residents of long-term care facilities and the state prepares to partially re-open later this month.

text: Folks, here we have it. Nearly ****90%*** of #covid19 deaths in hotspot Connecticut last week were in nursing homes. We are being lied to about the nature of what is happening bec. of muddled data, and as a result, the proper strategy going forward https://t.co/pD0HC9eie2

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
